returns._0: The address of the underlying asset

balanceOf(address).details: Balance = scaledBalance * liquidity indexThis grows over time as interest accrues

scaledBalanceOf(address).details: Scaled balance = balance / liquidity indexThis is the actual stored balance, constant unless deposits/withdrawals occur

returns._0: The scaled balance of the user

scaledTotalSupply().details: Scaled total supply = total supply / liquidity index

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the balance of the user (includes accrued interest)

scaledBalanceOf(address).notice: Returns the scaled balance of the user

totalSupply().notice: Returns the total supply (includes accrued interest)
